attributes.action: Stop the Daily Mirror printing out peoples previous crimes due to recent event
attributes.background:
The Daily Mirror has recently publicised a young man's recent accident and judged him on his previous car chase while advertising him as a drug dealer.
This has nothing to do with the recent car car crash this only encourages and increases hate crimes. This has to be stopped.

rejection.details:
Complaints about the press are the responsibility of the Independent Press Standards Organisation (IPSO), not  the Government or Parliament. 

If you wish to make a complaint to IPSO, you can do so by clicking on the link below and following the instructions:

https://www.ipso.co.uk/IPSO/makeacomplaint.html
